name: Food Loss and Waste Reduction
objective: To conduct research and related activities that support USDA’s strategy to reduce food loss and waste.  These activities may include the development of educational materials; the conduct of workshops and courses; or the conduct of research on best practices with respect to food loss and waste reduction and food recovery.
sub_agency_name: The Office of the Chief Economist
beneficiary_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
